website_summaries.verdict: A good option if you want the classic bootcut; otherwise we recommend the 501 style if you want a classic, comfortable fit.
pros: Combines 5-pocket design and 100-percent cotton construction in a cut that goes perfectly with boots
cons: Some of our testers noted that they run a bit large in the thighs, and the blue dye has the tendency to wear off on your skin until they are washed several times

customer_reviews.title: Bought Levi's since I was a kid. These are ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought Levi's since I was a kid. These are seconds being sold full price. What are seconds? Miscut, missewed, whatever you want to call them, rejects! Bought them for work pants and they'll do, but I won't take the chance and order pants on line. I can go anywhere that sells Levi's, grab a pair in my size, and without trying them on they'll fit perfectly. Not these! That's how I know they're seconds. Even the belt loops aren't right and smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Diablo53

customer_reviews.title: LEVI!!! The worst product.
customer_reviews.text: Levi needs to check the quality control department. I have purchased their boot cut 517 jeans for a couple of decades & this is the first time I ever had any of their jeans last less than two months. They did last even two washing without becoming thread bare. I don't know what to do with this lost of brand loyalty.
customer_reviews.author: Raymonda F. Tasker

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Photo shows difference in length between 505 and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 33 34 505. Decided to try some 517. Ordered 33 34. Tried them on, and they seemed OK, a bit tighter than the 505. Then I washed them. Not I have clown pants that I cannot button or zip. Length after washing is near 2 inches shorter than the 505 after washing. Waist is at least an inch tighter. Not happy. Photo shows difference in length between 505 and 517.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Design is good but size is too small (BE CAREFUL)
customer_reviews.text: Design is good but size sucks. I bought a size 30x30 but it's actually feels like 28 or 29(Too small) When you buy this jean BE CAREFUL. If you want to buy 30x30 your jean size is 31x30 or 32x30. Now I live in South Korea I can't pay round trip delivery fee,,,,(It will cost abut 40$) But if I were live in US I would definitely refund it. In June 2016, I bought a jean on LEVIS US official site, size was 30x30 it fits well, but,,,this jean size is error really !!
customer_reviews.author: LIM W.

customer_reviews.title: Great pants
customer_reviews.text: These are my latest additions to my Levi's collection. I've worn this same model and size for at least 20 years. I get them riding length (extra long) and they fit over my boots perfectly. Great for everything else, too, but I do roll the cuff up a few inches when worn with more normal shoes. They are softer than the traditional indigo Levi's which I like. I wash them cold, partially dry them in a drier, and then line dry them the rest of the way, fold, and store. Never have shrunk enough to notice. Just keep getting softer - I never use fabric softener either. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: label says 100% cotton, but they are stretchy / baggy if you sit or work in them
customer_reviews.text: Levi's Men's 517 Bootcut Jean - Rinsed Thought to try these again, but the manufacturers have changed the fabric from the "original 517". The label says 100% cotton, but they are stretchy / baggy if you sit or work in them. I blame it on the weave of the fabric and the overall quality of the fabric. Most disappointed in these. Levi's used to be a good reliable brand (about 14 years ago) but like a lot of other well known brand names are not putting out the quality that customers came to expect. Now they are just relying on their Name to sell the product.
customer_reviews.author: another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: They were not denim. If they weren't denim why didn't you say so? I would not have ordered. Bought 517 jeans for my boys for 40 years. These 517's have very large legs. They were always a slim like Jean with bootcut bottoms. Not happy at all. Compared to 517 jeans I bought at Penny's in 2014. Not the same. These materialblsck jeans look cheap & gather lint
customer_reviews.author: katydue2

customer_reviews.title: Length varies drastically.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my dad, he is very picky so I ordered two of the dark stone wash. Both from this listing and there is at least a four inch difference in the pants. They are SUPPOSE TO BE the exact same. 517 in Dark Stonewash, size 34x36. How is this ever possible. I looked at all the tags and they say they’re the same thing, obviously something got messed up. I’m very annoyed because this was a birthday present and now I have to deal with returning.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Ginuwine, there is no room for you in these jeans.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 33 waist like all my other jeans but these were a very tight fit. Honestly I've been eating Ben & Jerry's a little too frequently so that might be the reason. Anyhow, I sent them back and ordered a 34. These are kind of tight too. Might have been the Domino's pizza last week, but who's counting? Minus one star for the dye turning my socks purple after trying them on for 5 minutes and they are snug in the junk. If you order a 33x34 in the future just know that there's a chance that I've been in them. Don't worry I come from a clean household.
customer_reviews.author: London's Padre

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the same size 517 Levi Jean's since 1969. I'm not sure if they were labeled wrong size wise, or because they were stretch. Definitely TOO BIG all around. They were advertised as 100% cotton. The Jean's I received were 65% cotton 35% stretch fabric. Now I doni't know if I order again, will they were returned. Got the exchange today... AGAIN STRETCH!! 65/35% . TOO BIG. WILL RETURN AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: mudda

customer_reviews.title: great Jeans, very happy
customer_reviews.text: The fit great, bought two pair. I wash them in cold water and add fabric softener, dry on low and they come out soft, not stiff as you would expect. they look good enough to go dancing in. Do not buy them bigger than you need... I'm a 35" waist and bought 34" for the fit I need. The 35" I bought first, will be worn after the holiday expansion.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: Color does NOT match photo. Also, good luck getting the correct size
customer_reviews.text: Jeans did NOT look like the ones in the photo. Color was more like the solid, dark, unwashed denim you see in farm supply stores. Not what I was looking for. Also, I ordered two pairs of 30x34 jeans. Instead, I received one pair of 34x29, and one pair of 34x34. So whoever fulfilled the order, please note that that is not how men’s pants work—you can’t just match one of the numbers, regardless of whether it’s the waist or inseam, and be good to go. Both numbers have to match, and in the same order as requested.
customer_reviews.author: FirstGradersx2

customer_reviews.title: Nice durability but cowboy-like fit in the inseam!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars on durability and waist size. What knocks it way down is the discomfort when sitting down. The inseam seems like it's meant for a female as there is veeeery little room down there. Maybe I'm not a cowboy type, but all other jeans I have DO NOT make me have to stand up to tug down the bunched material at the crotch. I wish there were another 1/2 to 1 inch more distance for comfort. I know the bootcut means a snug thigh, but NOT a snug inseam, please! The length was impressive though. For a 33x36 usually the leg length is too short, but this one managed to be too long. Interesting combination.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Morris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality Levi 517 jeans
customer_reviews.text: The material was very cheap not the high quality as the many other Levi 517 that I have. I measured the thickness with a micrometer and compared with other 517 jeans, they were not nearly as thick as the others. I went to local store and purchased them, Levi 517, at the same price and the quality of the material was the thickness as the others I have. Amazon shipped me inferior jeans. I will not purchase clothing from Amazon again. They do not deserve any stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Levi's has changed their sizes up in a crazy way. I ordered a 36W x 34L first (I'm about a 33 inch waist but like a size up) and sent them back because they were very tight. These fit ok, feels like the cut is different than the last Levi's I bought. The cut/fit and crazy sizing is why I removed a star- would have been two except for the quality of material. The material is great! Feels thicker than others and doesn't feel stretch and thin like it might tear easy. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: TN Colby

customer_reviews.title: Fit and durability NOT as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in Levi's current fit and quality. I won't be ordering this brand again. I'm old enough to remember when Levi was domestically made and a quality product....not anymore on either count. I've since discovered that Wrangler sticks to their advertised fit and finish not to mention that Wrangler is now the new benchmark for durability for those of us that are in need of a really rugged denim jean. Capt'n Larry A. Phillips
customer_reviews.author: Capt'n Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it was just me, but..
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are knock-offs or if Levi's quality has hit the skids. These fit more like a 34" waist instead of 32.. And the weight/ thickness of the denim was laughable. I buy men's jeans because I need something durable. I'd have worn a hole in the knee of these in 2 weeks. They're going back.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sumrow

customer_reviews.title: Better than ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Levi 517s my whole life (now in my 60s). These are the best 517s I've ever bought. They used to be made of 100 percent cotton, so they shrank a lot with washing. Nowadays they are made with 60 percent cotton and 40 percent polyester. So they shrink a lot less and seem just as durable as my old cotton 517s. I also like that they now have two more belt loops than my older 517s. I am 6'2" and weigh 185 to 190 pounds. A pair sized 34" by 34" fits like they were tailored for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing the 517 Bootcut for the last 10+ years. Never had any problem. When I ordered these I thought I was getting what he usually wears but that was not the case. The ones he received are a stretch jean, darker than what he usually gets, but that was my fault as I didn't understand the colors I guess. He won't even try them on until they have been washed. These are so baggie in the thigh but area they look terrible. Can't return them now because I washed them. I won't buy these from Amazon again. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Jeans so far
customer_reviews.text: I must have a weird body shape because until I bought these "Nothing " fit right.Iv'e given away more Jeans to Charity than I'd like to admit.Maybe because they are made in Nicaragua .Is Anything made here in the USA anymore?I would gladly pay more for a Tag that says Made in the USA but thats not gonna happen so I'll settle for something I have no control over.Love these Jeans anyway!!Bye the way the best Biker boots (Harley Davidson) Ive ever owned were made in Vietnam as well as my Harley Helmet and my Harley Baseball style T-Shirt made in Turkey.I wonder where my Bike was made.
customer_reviews.author: Charlane Valade

customer_reviews.title: Way too long
customer_reviews.text: I wear pants with 32" inseams. Every other brand in my size fits fine. These are so long they drop way past my heels and drag on the floor. I measured them and they do in fact measure 32". I guess the crotch sits a lot lower in these. I had to send them back and I'm debating if I should order a size 2" shorter. The quality was pretty good but I don't know why they're a lot more than other brands. I guess you pay for the name.
customer_reviews.author: Flyguy

customer_reviews.title: Things that I liked about this order included
customer_reviews.text: I was able to order this pair of Levis using sizing from a pair of 517's at home that fit well. Things that I liked about this order included: (1) the promptness of the delivery, (2) the excellent packaging, (3) the fit of the garment, (4) the color of the jeans, and (5) the boot cut tailoring that will not become "high water" after a few washes. I was hesitant to mail order jeans since I usually have to try on a number of jeans at the store to find a pair that fits. No disappointment here. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Still great after all these years...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband, who rarely orders clothing online, because things often aren't what they seem, and if they don't fit properly, returns can be a bother. But these are familiar jeans, and with Levi's style numbering system, we knew exactly what we would get. They're not a soft, washed denim, but the old-style "rigid" deep blue indigo jeans that soften over time. They fit exactly as expected. One thing to note about this dark denim is that it does transfer to fabrics very easily. So try to remember not to sit on light colored furniture, car seats, etc., because I imagine the dye is a bear to remove!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great fit over boots and perfect fit all over.
customer_reviews.text: Jeans fit perfectly. I hate spandex they put in women's jeans, so I always by Levi's. Most women s jeans only have 31 inch inseam and are very short. Fit perfect over boots and just right in the caboose!! Shipped quickly and brand new in package.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Eads

customer_reviews.title: Great material but leg twists
customer_reviews.text: It's great to see Levi's using great fabric again (they had moved to cheaper materials years ago and now they are back to the original high quality fabric). But, they are somehow processing each leg differently (maybe from different bolts of fabric?), so the seams don't line up correctly for each leg. It you are using these solely as work jeans, you may not care how they look. My husband is a sales person who is allowed to wear jeans -- how they look is really important. The twisted seams diminish the professional look. We are bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this product.. since I work out a lot I realized an increase in thigh and glute size so I decided to order a size up to accommodate my muscles and it fitted like a glove and felt very comfortable.. I'm hoping to be lucky the next time I order another one.. the reason is I've realized the same size can fit differently depending on where it was made
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be. :(
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been buying Levis 517 jeans for years. This time we ordered a size up from his usual size because the last time he got his usual size (35) they barely fit. When he got his 36 jeans, they, too were snug. We also noticed that the dye (rinse) has rubbed off on everything for several months: his leather truck seats, his easy chair, and even onto his skin on his hands! Were it not for the fact that he loves Levis 518, the boot cut, etc., he would probably switch brands. $40 is a bit much to pay for jeans that leave blue dye everywhere and are becoming inconsistent on sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Janice K. Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't wear overalls 😄 stretch jeans allow for crawling around under tractors easily, climbing on everything like a monkey
customer_reviews.text: These stretch jeans have become invaluable to my husband's work day. As a farmer...Who doesn't wear overalls 😄 stretch jeans allow for crawling around under tractors easily, climbing on everything like a monkey, & easy, comfortable sitting in a tractor seat for hours at a time. Only problem, a little while into the day, they have stretched out around the waistband & tend to slip down some but it's the price one pays for the comfort of stretch jeans.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Levis for years. I own multiple pairs, including other 517s, and they're all 34 length. 34 fits me perfectly. I recently ordered another pair of 517s in 34 length, and they're way too long. They drag on the ground. I checked the label thinking I had been sent the wrong size, but the label says 34. Don't know how these can be so much longer than all my other Levis, but they are. I'm not talking a slight difference in length, the difference is huge. If the sizing is going to be that inconsistent, I don't think I'll be buying Levis online anymore. I'll stick to buying them in stores where I can try them on first.
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: Fits good and good color.
customer_reviews.text: These are a little more snug in hips and thighs. I went up on size to allow for shrinkage. I hope that works because correct size was kinda snug before washing. They hold up well though. Bottom of leg is largest of any other boot cut that I’ve had. They could reduce by 1 inch and still be plenty big. But I hate taper leg and straight leg is still a little too small for boots. With a size 14 foot it’s hard to get through small leg pants anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think the jeans I was shipped were authentic.. I’ve washed them over 20 Times now, and their still bleeding blue die on everything.. when I wear them, at the end of the day my hands are blue, my shoes where the jeans touch are blue, my underwear are blue, and everything I sit on gets blue die on it. I can’t imagine this is normal for authentic Levi’s.. very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor QC, but Still Wearable
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers have found, Levi's just up to par anymore. I ordered 4 pairs of these 517, confident in the correct size after buying one. Only one pair has reasonably straight and symmetrical legs and consistent sewing. The other 3 have noticeable misalignment in the seams from leg to leg, but not so bad that I'd reject them. But it's obvious when you iron them that the seams are all off one way or the other. Not up to par with other jean brands in this price range. The fit is generally good though, so I will keep them.
customer_reviews.author: bg17

customer_reviews.title: 50-50 chance they will fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought four pairs of these Levi’s for my husband size 31 x 30. This is the size he always takes. Two pairs fit him perfectly and two pairs were too small in his waist. he couldn’t even come close to buttoning them. They were all marked with the correct size, however, two didn’t fit. Still would like to order more but I don’t want to take the chance of having to return them also.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks. t-shirt thin denim
customer_reviews.text: Shrinks 2 inches in waist and 4 in leg when washing cold and hang dry. After 20 washes still leaving blue marks everywhere. Outside seam does a weird spiral twist to the inseam. One leg shorter than the other. Update: bought second pair but you can only review once if you've ordered multiple times, this time ordered same size but waist 2 sizes larger and could almost fit two legs in one pant leg.
customer_reviews.author: Bravo52

customer_reviews.title: Best jeans he ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these jeans as a gift for someone who works hard and needed a really solid pair of jeans. He liked them so much after the first time he wore them, he asked if he could get some more. Levis are just pure classic jeans. These a relaxed fit so they are loose in the leg/thigh and the waist fits great without rubbing and the length is standard across all other jeans he wears.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are a crapshoot.
customer_reviews.text: Man, I miss the days you could buy Levi's and didn't worry whether or not they would fit correctly. Now a days it's too long or too short, too tight or too loose. Sometimes the pant leg twists the seam while wearing. I mean, whose watching quality control? Nicaragua seems to have the most reliable sizes followed by Vietnam. Check country of origin prior to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Wick and Dani California

customer_reviews.title: These jeans will make you blue.
customer_reviews.text: Every other blue jean company in the world has figured out how to not have the dye run 4 eternity. But not Levi's. They make a great product that will color everything you own blue, even after 6 washings. the inside of your dryer is going to be blue. If you sit on your bathtub at, it's going to be blue. The leather in your car is going to turn blue. The tongue of all of your shoes is going to be blue. and yet somehow, every other blue jean company has figured out how to not make their colors run forever...
customer_reviews.author: ross r blaising

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: The Levi’s 517 is the pair of jeans that I like the best of all jeans I buy. They are the most comfortable and the best looking, I buy the 517 because of the boots I wear plus I do not like any jeans tat fit tight around my ankles. I will continue to buy the Levi’s 517 in the future. As well as the other reasons I buy Levi’s is because of their durability.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Peery

customer_reviews.title: Levi buyers beware
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 x 31x 32 517's.Of the first three, one pair had a leg 2" shorter than the other and in addition, the 31" waist was at least 34" on 2 of the 3 pair. These were replaced by Amazon and once again, one of the 31"s was 34"!!! Having worn Levis for 50+ years, I feel qualified to observe that LS quality/quality control is at a new all-time low...what crap! Amazon performed well, they just had a terrible product to deal with...
customer_reviews.author: c bar

customer_reviews.title: Somethings wrong
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have wore Levi's all our life. He's 75. These pants didn't even began to fit. There way too small. He's always has wore 42 or 44. He's not that much different now than before. They really run small. I got him a pair of 42's and 44's. Neither fit. They are making them different. Maybe they need bigger Chinese to try these on.
customer_reviews.author: mawmaw

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what it is about Levi jeans, but I just cant get used to the way they fit. This goes for any Levi jeans that I have owned besides the signature series (which are usually a lot cheaper). If you are ok with the fit, these are probably decent jeans. They seemed to be of great quality, but I just cant sacrifice comfort for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bstevens2729

customer_reviews.title: Durability leaves much to be desired, and shrinks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 5 pairs of these jeans in April of 2017. One pair quickly shrunk to a size too small (30 from a 32) to wear despite treating them the same as any jeans, wash on gentle cycle, cold water, line dry. One pair, the one pictured, has already worn through considerably. I don't work in construction or anything demanding, so I am considerably displeased that a pair of Levi's, a brand that usually stands for top notch quality, holds up only as good, or worse, than less expensive brands, such as Wrangler.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best Jeans Made but priced TOO High!
customer_reviews.text: This Levis style is the best jeans that's made!! The 517 Stretch Levis fit perfectly! But the downside is, the price is way too steep for being made in Latin American countries for pennies, then sold back to us at over 500% profit! I bought 2 pairs of these jeans at Amazon on May 7, 2017 for $34.99 a pair, but in just two days, the price shot up to $59!! Now they are $55. STILL way too much!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Zip It
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try these after getting annoyed with the button fly setup on the 501's. These fir pretty much the same, maybe a little snugger at the thigh, and the boot cut is fine with me. For what it's worth, these were made in Nicaragua. The last pair of 501's I bought were made In Egypt. I think I prefer the Central American manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: cheesis

customer_reviews.title: These jeans wear out way too fast!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn levis my whole life, and theyve always given me my moneys worth quality wise. However, both pairs of these jeans are falling apart before my eyes with very light (non work related) usage. Its so bad that I’m beginning to question whether these are levis or a knock off brand. I’ve never worn out where the belt loop attaches before, nor the top corner of the rear pockets, but both pair are showing heavy wear in these places. I’ve never had these problems before, and have worn many pair. Even those I’ve worked in held up way better. Maybe levis is using cheaper material...idk?
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are very inaccurate. Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Strike three for amazon. The waist is a good two/three inches from even coming close to being able to close. Can't zip at all. Too small. Had purchased these same pants from another store. Same size fit fine. I will be returning these and will no longer make the attempt to by these online again.
customer_reviews.author: A shopper

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Close to Original
customer_reviews.text: The classic Levi 517 Bootcut jeans are getting more and more difficult to find. If these aren't the original classic Levi's they are very close. A denim with a nice weight, not a poly blend. Fit was dead on. Comments from Levi on the difficulty in locating these have indicated that they may be on the way out. Stocking up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Love these Levi boot cut jeans.
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Levi jeans. To bad they aren't made in the USA, but are still good quality. The cut and sizing was perfect for me and I now have three pair. The slight flair at the bottom is nice with boots or sneakers. The cut is tighter through the thighs so if you do heavy workouts with your thighs, this isn't for you. The black color is just as well made as the blue tones.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ring

customer_reviews.title: FAILURE AS A SELLER.
customer_reviews.text: SCRATCH THAT. The previous review was far too generous. I bought 2 pairs, and got one replaced when it wore thru next to the back pocket after just 2 washes. 2. WASHES. Cold water, gentle cycle, non-acid detergent. Low-temp tumble dry for 1 hour. My replacement pair is also ruined after JUST 2 WASHES. Zappos is clearly selling KNOCKOFFS. These aren't the Levi's I paid 41 bucks a pair for.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Ink

customer_reviews.title: They are what they say they are.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest the wide bottom was more than I was expecting. Reminded me slightly of a bell bottom. And the thigh was more snug than I had expected, even though the waist was slightly too big (but I'm not complaining about that). All that said, this was my first time wearing boot-cut jeans. Also, I did see where it said slim fitting. Just wanted to try them out. The reason for 3 stars, is that I just didn't like them. If I did have one complaint, it's that I couldn't get them shorter than 30". However, if you're looking for thigh-huggers with a slight bell bottom feel to the legs, then these are just the jeans for you!
customer_reviews.author: L. Winthorpe III

customer_reviews.title: The Rinse color is perfect for a "Good Pair" jeans
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Levi's jeans for 9 years. They always fit as expected. Since I am a rather tall guy, it is usually difficult to find pants that fit. Now that I know my size and can order with ease knowing they will fit. They are at the right length for legs and fits most boots perfectly. They do not ride up and breathable space for the important region. The Rinse color is perfect for a "Good Pair" jeans. Something to go dancing in, to a public function, or to look nice. I can consider it my dress pants and use it for when I'm not working or plan on getting dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Frank

customer_reviews.title: DECEPTIVE PICTURES. THEY NO LONGER HAVE 7 BELT LOOPS
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these jeans working as an industrial mechanic for about 3 years and have been relatively happy with their longevity. Recently, I ordered another pair, checked the fit, pulled the tags, and washed them before realizing THEY NO LONGER HAVE SEVEN BELT LOOPS. NOW THEY HAVE FIVE BELT LOOPS LIKE LITTLE BOYS PANTS. The pictures clearly show 7 belt loops and every pair I've ever owned has had 7. This is another in a long series of disappointments in Levi's gradual decrease in quality. It won't be long before these will have spandex added in and be made of low quality, thin denim like the rest of the Levi's line.
customer_reviews.author: FLACB

customer_reviews.title: Never Fail.....Levi's
customer_reviews.text: Hubs is 32x36 I always have to order his levi's as nobody ever carries his size in stores. Imagine my excitement when I could just get them from amazon! Also, imagine my excitement when they arrived not smelling like sulfar or whatever 90% of brand new jeans smell like! Of course they fit as expected, they're true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Deeiam

customer_reviews.title: 32 inseams means 32
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in my normal size, 30x32. Literally every pair of pants I have is a 32 inseam. I Nissley order these in that size, but they were way too long. I actually took measuring tape and found the measured inseam on these was 32 inches. Turns out I actually fit the 30 inseam better. Luckily I was able to do a free return and got these in the correct size. The pants are very soft and fit well. The material is a lot thinner than my old Levi's. I do really like the fade and wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 517 Boot cut
customer_reviews.text: I have been wraring 517 for years still love them. These fit as expected. I like my pants long so these are appx 1.5 inches to long for most people who are 5'7". I get the dark stone wash. Remember they will bleed in wash first few times you wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for the denim
customer_reviews.text: I always try to purchase Levis unwashed stiff as a board. The denims are coarser/rigid and long lasting. This pair seemed to lack the coarseness/rigidity. I can feel the difference between this pair and past pairs. They fit fine and I can live with them ...no problem.....the store/seller was fine...the product is not quite LEVI USA?
customer_reviews.author: R. Racoon

customer_reviews.title: You know what you’re getting.
customer_reviews.text: Husband has always worn Levi’s 517s. They fit like he wants them to and he likes them. He says his only complaint is how much thinner the material is these days, but Levi’s are way better than some of the other brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: J Harmon

customer_reviews.title: no jeanie
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what they were thinking. They are just pants. No Jeanie at all. I'm giving them four stars because if I had made a wish for pants these fit pretty well, a little loose but not bad, but still I wanted wishes and these are not Jeanie pants.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Return label unable to be printed out.
customer_reviews.text: I think QC has suffered grately through COVID-19. Large stain on left front pant leg and waist Zipper locks up 1/2 way up. Goes down but not up. Attention! I am not able to print the return label. I have tried multiple times. I am requesting that a return label be mailed to me! This is unacceptible! I’ve purchased many Levi’s but have never had such a bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth meddis

customer_reviews.title: 517 great jeans
customer_reviews.text: 517 in the color rigid. Despite the fact that the model gives a shrinkage of about 5% when washing, order the size in the belt one less than usual. for example, if you wear W36, order W35 or W34; if you wear 34, order 33. The length of the "raw" product is also larger, about an inch-half inch. Consider the high heel of a cowboy boot. If washed in hot water, over time, the length is planted about half an inch.
customer_reviews.author: andrii fomin

customer_reviews.title: hard to find
customer_reviews.text: For the older crowed , you cant find these jeans even on the Levis site. So I was happy and surprised To find my husbands favorite jeans on amazon.... He does not like any other style or kind of jean, so will be getting these from here from now on
customer_reviews.author: Paiger

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat long and I'm somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat long and I'm somewhat disappointed. Since I couldn't find a pair of Levi's Men's 517 Bootcut Jeans in any stores around here I decided to try to buy online. I ordered a pair of 40"W x 30"L (the size I've been buying in stores for years) in a "Rinse" color. The waist was accurate but they were too long. They measured 31" though the label said 30". (So much for quality control). I had hoped to buy a couple of more pairs after getting these but no longer will. Because they don't fall under the "Free Returns" policy, I'm just going to hang them in the back of my closet in case of emergencies. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again for sure!!! Great price, quality
customer_reviews.text: Great jeans!!! Great price will definitely buy again!!! It’s hard to find the 517 Boot cut in the stores. Plus this price is way better!!! Same quality!!! Love the black jeans too on my husband!!! My husband is 5’6” 175 lbs Alittle long but perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila G.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I tried them on when I received them
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I tried them on when I received them, they fit very well. I washed them, they shrunk 1 1/2 inch in one leg and 1 inch in other leg. I sent them back. No more Levi's for me
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Like a Glove!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Levi Strauss & Co since...well...I'm 60, you figure it out. Always a good fit, comfortable and wears well. The price could be less but what are you going to do. In reality I would be willing to pay more to get this quality. When anyone says "jeans" or "bluejeans" THIS is what I think of.
customer_reviews.author: Rathburn's Den

customer_reviews.title: May be cheap knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 34X36, I am 6’2” and 178 lbs. I love to run. All my other Levi’s are 34X36 and are a bit loose. These are tight, and get tighter with every wash. They seem like seconds or cheap imitations, the famous Levi label is some sort of paper. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Levi's are a younger man's game
customer_reviews.text: I forgot that Levi's are a younger man's game. Everything fit fine except around the butt. my middle age butt is just way too big for Levi's now. Waist ok, length ok, thighs, ok. The rise and butt, not ok. I'll have to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Caemmerer

customer_reviews.title: I've been wearing these for years.
customer_reviews.text: Others just don't fit as well, or feel as good. These last me several years before they turn into cutoffs. I live on a small acreage, built the barns, fenced the pasture, helped build the house, finished the walkout myself. I'm kinda hard on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy/John

customer_reviews.title: They're Levis
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was expected, wearing a pair right now. Only complaint was when they decided to decrease the thickness of the material several years ago. Not as durable, but I'm not in the field anymore so not as much of a concern to me. They're Levis anyway, always good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Butler

customer_reviews.title: The picture shown is slimmer than the product
customer_reviews.text: Got these while they are really good quality the fit isn't right. Maybe list in the description they fit baggy rather than boot cut if you are looking for a more vintage slim bootcut go with a slim bootcut I guess. I got them tailored to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwin Rackal

customer_reviews.title: Slim boot cut
customer_reviews.text: About the best fit for me these days. Trim in the legs, not at all baggy. Flare well to fit over boots. I like to start off with new denim that hasn't got the prewashed (half-worn-out) look. They look a little dressier, if jeans can be regarded as such. Only reason for 4-stars is nobody makes blue denim in the USA. Also, you can't get the heavy-weight fabric we used to, even for work jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Yanney

customer_reviews.title: I would really like these jeans
customer_reviews.text: OK, I would really like these jeans, except they are too long (not too large). The inseam is listed as 32 inches, but it is actually 33.25. Unfortunately, my inseam is 31", but I can work with jeans at 32". Those at 33.25" must be hemmed--extra expense. Otherwise, good look and fit. Hmm, wonder if the 30" inseams are actually 31.25"? Good Luck
customer_reviews.author: QuietStorm10475

customer_reviews.title: They do not fit like normal Levi's
customer_reviews.text: These are not Levi's. They are some kind of imported knockoff. They do not fit like normal Levi's, they were about 3 inches longer than expected. Be sure they fit right for you or be prepared to send them back. I personally waited 3 months for this order and would have been better of buying at JCPenny's.
customer_reviews.author: ltjdrich

customer_reviews.title: I've come back to Levi's
customer_reviews.text: After years of wearing a brand that never felt quite right I bought a couple pairs of Levi's 517 Boot Cut Jeans. I had worn boot cut Levi's in the past and have no idea why I stopped wearing them - but I'm glad I bought these and am pleased with the fit and look.
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic Levi's ?
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe these are authentic levi's don't fit well,seems to be a little on the large size. Length of jeans are a little longer. Belt loops are different sizes ,when using a belt some loops are tight to get belt through and some are large. Possibly counterfeit jeans as well the denim seems a little on the light side. Should have listen to other reviews, dye on jeans stained dryer hub as well.
customer_reviews.author: fjp

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans
customer_reviews.text: The jeans are exactly what my husband was looking for. Levi’s had a better fit than wrangler. I just wish I could find some small waist 36 length for my son. If anyone can find me about 3 pair in a 29 x 36 I would be so excited. some of these run smaller then others last pair too tight while pair before fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Leah M Jasik

customer_reviews.title: These pants are very heavy and not made for wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: These pants are very heavy and not made for wearing in the summer , you might want to buy the 501 light stone wash jeans, plus they where long er that my other 501s
customer_reviews.author: michael mfj

customer_reviews.title: If it’s not broke don’t fix it
customer_reviews.text: my Amazon experience has been great. this complaint is for the Levi company. they have changed how the 517 are cut. my husband has been wearing this cut for over 30 yrs. its the only cut he wears, So i contact Levi and they suggest him going to a skinny jean. he cant (wont) wear his motorcycle boots with skinny jeans. he wont wear a skinny jeans. Plus they add another 2 belt loops. If its not broke don't fix it.
customer_reviews.author: debbie kemp

customer_reviews.title: Not real Levi
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so i tried...i really did. Been wearing (and hating since Nov) . They arrived with a really odd, almost bleached crease in the middle of each leg. Not where any earthly crease should be. Then recently after light wear, weekly washing at the most, a spot on leg has begun to wear through almost disintegrating. I love the Levi 517, but this seller is clearly pushing cheap knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: matthew ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars I would. I ordered 2 pair of 34/30 and they fit like 30/30. I washed them before I tried them on like I always do due to a reaction of fresh dyes from China. They were so tight I had to triple check the size on pants and my order. BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Ordered size  as received was not actual size.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size was not actual size. We’re too long. I Ordered a 32 “ inseam and as received measured at 34”. But the tag was marked 32 “. I ordered two pairs and both were longer than tagged size. So I returned them. Made in China too.
customer_reviews.author: Pen_Name

customer_reviews.title: Knock off’s?
customer_reviews.text: Idk if these are knock off’s or if Levi’s are just getting more crappy. The material seems very thin. It lacks the utility feel they used to have and I’m sure won’t last very long. I’m actually pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Unique fit, sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: These are meant to be tight around the thighs and glutes, which they are. They also are made from a hardier fabric so they don’t give much before being worn-in. I’ve only had them a short time, but I expect they will last a long time given the fabric, and I do like the fit, just needed to go a size higher than normal.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Levi BootCut Jeans
customer_reviews.text: This jeans fit better than most jeans I have purchased for my husband. If you have legs that are larger than most jeans, these jeans are for you. skinny jeans are no good if you have muscular legs........
customer_reviews.author: Judith Priddy

customer_reviews.title: Levi 517 Jeans
customer_reviews.text: I buy the Levi 517 Jeans because they have a belt loop between the center back loop and the side loop, this prevents my Buck Knife from shifting to the middle of my back. The problem that I have is that of the three pairs of 517 Jeans, one of them was a 505 Jean which doesn't have the desired belt loop.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: I wear 38/36 in Levi's 517 and they fit great but there's different kind's of 517's
customer_reviews.text: I wear 38/36 in Levi's 517 and they fit great but there's different kind's of 517's. These are pretty large but I'll keep them and break them in because I'd rather have them a little large. Shipping was all good..
customer_reviews.author: Bill Summering

customer_reviews.title: Wear out within a month to two months
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these jeans are terrible through Amazon. I have complained to Levi’s and they have said that for some reason when purchased through Amazon the quality is not is good they do not understand why.
customer_reviews.author: AngVan

customer_reviews.title: Levi Boot Cut 517 can be found on AMAZON !!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband always bought his Levi Boot Cut 517 from JCPenneys. They are not carrying them any more. My husband has worn these forever. I am not sure what he will do if we can not ever find any. After we returned from the mall I went on Amazon, and low and behold they carry them. Just like we have bought in the past. Washed them and my husband was ready to go. They are just like he always wore and he is very Happy!! Thank You Amazon
customer_reviews.author: lcatz1

customer_reviews.title: Only Jeans to Buy
customer_reviews.text: Levi jeans are the only ones that fit me the way jeans should. They hold up longer than most and don't sag or bag after putting them on. The price through Amazon if I watch is always cheaper and always in stock.
customer_reviews.author: C. SINN

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Jean.....somewhat
customer_reviews.text: Been buying the Jeans for decades They are the only BOOTCUT Jeans that my husband fits into. the only problem is he has no butt so he always has to wear a belt and he hates that!!!! On this order I got a smaller waist size we will see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Gee

customer_reviews.title: These paint ran a little small
customer_reviews.text: I do like the boot cut 517 size 32/32 for thirty/fourth years I’m blessed I guess, I have a pair that I’m wearing now same size great fit I needed to retry them little small same good quality I’ll keep buying them
customer_reviews.author: steven s.

customer_reviews.title: I'm just not used to Levi's. Brand new. Good deal. Fit how they are supposed to fit.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just not used to Levi's. Brand new. Good deal. Fit how they are supposed to fit. Only positives for the seller. I will give the seller 5 stars. I got the product as described and quickly. The ratings on the fitting are only because I usually wear American Eagle, but they have become harder to find in the boot cut and more expensive because of that I assume.These jeans look very good and I was complimented on them. Just a little different than I am used to. I would buy them again from this seller for sure but I may add an inch to the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely with my boots
customer_reviews.text: These jeans fits nicely with my cowboy boots. I recommend you turn the pants inside out and wash them before wearing them as to wash out the dye and dry them on low heat. Iron out any wrinkles in the pants you might have and they are ready to go. Very happy with my purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Quality stands the test of time
customer_reviews.text: Good ol levis just like an old friend comfortable always inviting. I love my jeans which means I love my Levi’s long lasting I hate to part with a pair always get more out of them than I got in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gdawg.

customer_reviews.title: Good Fitting Pair of Jeans
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the 517's ever since they screwed up the 505 with the below the waist fit. They fit me just right and the color stays a pretty long time before they start to fade. Love these jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save a trip to the store
customer_reviews.text: Same as in the store. Except I can’t get my length in the store, without ordering through the store. So being I’ve worn Levi’s my whole life this is the way to go. You already know what style fits right so go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Hughes

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its always a chore to order clothes online....you just never know. But in this case, the jeans fit perfect, were in good shape and will work out fine. I am so relieved!! Oh yes...the price was right on!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lozano

customer_reviews.title: This pants are mis tag men or something is not right are this fake I think this is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Men I have been buying Levi’s for more than 30 years and this is the worst experience I ever had this pants are like 6 size over on the waist and on the legs are like 3 inches over size the (boot cut is lo 11 inches wide wtf people please stop advertising this right away
customer_reviews.author: miguel garcia

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these jeans! It's his first time to get anything other than western style Wranglers. He likes the bit of stretch they have. I've already bought him a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: kevazzp

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my boyfriend and they fit perfect. He wears them a lot and they're holding ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and they fit perfect. He wears them a lot and they're holding up great. they material is a little different looking. I guess more something I would expect to see my dad wearing than a 20 something year old guy. but they work and he hasn't complained
customer_reviews.author: equusamber

product_meta.title: Levi's Men's 517 Bootcut Jean
product_meta.description:
Authentic bootcut jeans that fit over your boots. Durable, quality jeans.



More than 140 years after inventing the blue jean, one thing is clear: Levi’s clothes are loved by the people who wear them - from presidents to movie stars, farmers to fashion icons, entrepreneurs to the everyman. 'Live in Levi’s’ asserts with confidence and pride that Levi’s clothes are indeed for everybody who’s not just anybody.
